about_the_game:
GAME-PLAY

Get ready to run, gun, and blast through dynamic 3D environments in an all-out action-packed adventure! Pick your favorite mercenary, each armed with unique skills that make every run feel fresh and exhilarating. Unleash chaos with a vast arsenal of guns and attacks as you take down waves of relentless enemies and face off against colossal bosses. Whether you're going solo or teaming up with up to 3 friends, prepare for intense 4-player mayhem where punch-smashing and shoot-blasting chaos reign supreme!

STORY

The rent’s due, and our heroes are broke! Join a ragtag team of mercenaries on a bounty-hunting spree through the highs and lows of a futuristic city, battling through dangerous jungles and sinister labs to earn their next paycheck. Along the way, they’ll uncover a conspiracy that threatens to reshape the city's future—and their own. Will they save the day and pay rent, or bite off more than they can chew? Suit up for a wild ride filled with heart, humor, and high-octane action!

FEATURES

Immerse yourself in stunning hand-drawn visuals blended with cutting-edge 3D environments. Every character, enemy, and setting is meticulously designed to keep you hyped from start to finish, complemented by an electrifying soundtrack and fun, quirky story dialogue that adds flavor to your journey!

  • Classic shoot-'em-up gameplay with a modern twist on the retro arcade vibe

  • Beautifully hand-drawn 2D characters seamlessly blended with vibrant 3D graphics

  • Up to 4-player chaos—both online and local couch co-op for ultimate multiplayer fun

  • VS Mode - Had enough of co-op? Say no more! Jump into a brand-new, never-before-seen fighting style in this adrenaline-pumping Stryke-VS!

  • A fully voiced, story-driven campaign with memorable characters and witty banter

  • Chase the top spot on local leaderboards, with more features coming soon!

  • Rouge-lite mode for those craving an extra challenge!

    Be sure to visit our website for support and frequent Demo updates!

name: Rebellion Stryker
short_description: Run and gun, slide and slash your way through a 2.5D bounty hunting adventure. Fly solo or team up with a friend to challenge levels and bosses inspired by 16-bit and arcade classics.
